# JointTransforms.Index

**Type Alias**

A position of an individual joint transform in the collection.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias Index = Int
```

## Identifying joint transforms

- **JointTransforms.ArrayLiteralElement**: The type of the elements of an array literal.
- **JointTransforms.Element**: An individual joint transform in the collection.
